title: Is there a way to see your music list on your desktop, much like you would with your photos?
content: I want to find my Previously Played Music from last year, when I had a Pixel 3. My phone was factory reset, and my new phone only shows songs from when I activated it, but nothing from before. So, just like Google Maps or Photos, does it backup somewhere?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a
